pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10994] Update hot key detection log message
pullRequest.bodyText:
This makes the hotKeyLoggingEnabled pipeline option more discoverable.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message:
Update hot key detection log message

This makes the hotKeyLoggingEnabled pipeline option more discoverable.

nodes.bodyText: LGTM. Do we also want to refer the user to the set method? https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/runners/google-cloud-dataflow-java/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/runners/dataflow/options/DataflowPipelineOptions.java#L207
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,7 +52,9 @@ public void logHotKeyDetection(String userStepName, Duration hotKeyAge) {
     LOG.warn(
         "A hot key was detected in step '{}' with age of '{}'. This is "
             + "a symptom of key distribution being skewed. To fix, please inspect your data and "
-            + "pipeline to ensure that elements are evenly distributed across your key space.",
+            + "pipeline to ensure that elements are evenly distributed across your key space. If "
+            + "you want to log the plain-text key to Cloud Logging please re-run with the "
+            + "`hotKeyLoggingEnabled` pipeline option.",

commit.message: Add the cloud docs to hot key logging
